home.parrafo-info: Student graduated from Alvart University focused on the development of web and desktop applications. As a person who loves complexity, I specialize in the backend area since I have adapted to that environment and the large volume of functions.

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
I am a computer systems engineer graduated from Alvart University and a self-taught student of Web Development focused on backend programming, with extensive knowledge of preventive and corrective maintenance, experience in CCTV installation and structured cabling.

I aspire to get a job in the world of Web Development or gain experience, continue increasing my value as technical support and technician in CCTV installation, new knowledge and strengthen my professional life.

I am an empathetic and enthusiastic person, with skills focused on teamwork, assertive communication, problem solving, responsible and proactive, I like to learn from others and continually improve myself.

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: It was a relevant experience on my resume, where I worked as a freelancer installing cameras, gutters, structured cabling, and assembling nodes. I configured the DVR to connect the video surveillance to the client's cell phone via P2P; This was my most robust project, carried out for a hotel.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: My personal web portfolio, where you can find some of my projects, technical skills and a little about my information
proyectos.info-proyecto3: In my internship at the Instituto Compuingl√©s de Oriente, I learned equipment maintenance, diagnosis, backups, data migration and switch assembly. I managed to optimize a laboratory, increasing its operability from 20% to 95%.
